app.name: Application Name
app.short_description: Short description below the title on the marketplace
app.long_description:
Long description of the app that will go in the _Description_ tab on the marketplace. This supports markdown for formatting. New lines must be specified by the 
 delimiter
app.installation_instructions:
Install instructions that will go in the _How to setup_ tab on the marketplace. This supports markdown for formatting. New lines must be specified by the 
 delimiter
